tool.name: ProdyAnm
tool.description: : Wrapper of the ANM tool from the Prody package.

param.name: outname_output_pdb_path
param.label: output PDB name
param.help: Output multi-model PDB file with the generated ensemble Format: [output].pdb

param.name: sele
param.label: Take tool settings:
param.help: Select where tool settings are to be read from

param.name: properties
param.label: Configuration file
param.help: File containing tool settings. See below for the syntax

param.name: jsonstr
param.label: JSON string
param.help: JSON string containing tool settings. See below for the syntax

param.label: num_structs
param.help: Number of structures to be generated

param.name: cutoff
param.label: cutoff
param.help: Cutoff distance (Å) for pairwise interactions, minimum is 4.0 Å

param.name: rmsd
param.label: rmsd
param.help: Average RMSD that the conformations will have with respect to the initial conformation
